Later in the show, Rachel Green(Jennifer Aniston), MonicaGellar (Courteney Cox Arquette), Joey Tribbiani (Matt LeBlanc), Chandler Bing ( Matthew Perry), Phoebe Buffay ( Lisa Kudrow), are sitting on their couch when they notice that there's something strange about Marcel, oneofRoss ' pet monkey . They observeMarcel standing next to lamp , humpingit repeatedly while staring intently into space..Monicasuggeststhat maybe Marcellis just exhibiting some natural animal behavior but then notices somethings odd too - like how much time has passed since she last checked her watch ! Certainly! In Season 1, Episode 21 of Friends titled "The One with the Fake Party," Ross Geller (David Schwimmer) is planning a party to impress his ex-wife Carol Willick's new partner. However, he accidentally invites everyone in Central Perk instead and ends up hosting an impromptu gathering at Monica Gellar's(Courteney Cox) apartment while Rachel Green (Jennifer Aniston), Joey Tribbiani (Matt LeBlanc), Chandler Bing ( Matthew Perry).
Meanwhile, Phoebe Buffay (Lisa Kudrow) tries unsuccessfully to get rid of her pet monkey by giving it away as free stuff on Craigslist but ultimately decides against doing so after realizing how much she loves him when no one shows interest . The episode also features some hilarious moments between Gunther ,the coffee shop manager who has feelings for Rachel; Janice Litman Goralnik :Chandlers girlfriend from Long Island whom hes trying hard not like too much ; plus Jack & Judy Greeting each other awkwardly every time they see another inside central perks because their parents are always fighting about something silly such us whether or nor should judgy eat gluten again this week due t being allergic etcetera...

caption__00005:
In this scene from Friends, Rachel Green (Jennifer Aniston) is taking a dance class at the local community center. The camera pans across to show three women sitting on a bench outside the studio watching the class through an open window. One of them recognizes Monica Geller (Courteney Cox), who was recently in a head injury and has been experiencing memory loss.
The woman approaches her friends excitedly exclaiming "Monica!" while waving their hands around as if dancing before realizing that they are mistaken about identifying someone else with similar features standing nearby wearing sunglasses; she quickly turns back towards where monic might be seated inside without acknowledging either party's presence or attempting any conversation whatsoever because it seems like too much effort given recent events involving brain trauma!

caption__00006:
In this episode of Friends, titled "The One with the Gym Membership," Rachel and Monica are at a gym trying to get in shape. The scene opens with them exercising on treadmills while chatting about their love lives.
Rachel is feeling self-conscious because she's gained weight since her breakup with Ross, so they decide to join together for support as well as motivation. They introduce themselves to each other before being interrupted by two women who ask if one can use an elliptical machine that has been reserved but not used all day long (by another woman). After some negotiation between these three ladies over whose turn it was or wasn’t going anywhere near those machines anymore – especially after someone mentioned something smelly -– everything gets resolved amicably enough until later when we see how things go wrong again! It seems like there might be more drama ahead regarding shared workout equipment among friends...or maybe just within ourselves whenever our own personal fitness journeys take center stage alongside others around us? Either way.,<Cap>Do you ever feel like your life isn't turning out quite right?'</img>.

Certainly! In this episode of Friends, titled "The One with the Stealer," Ross Geller is upset after discovering that his ex-wife Carol (Anita Barone) has been stealing food from him. The scene opens with Rachel Green and Joey Tribbiani sitting in Central Perk when they notice Ross pacing outside.
Ross enters the coffee shop looking agitated as he tells them about Carole's actions: she took a turkey sandwich out of their fridge without asking; then at Monica Gellar’s Thanksgiving dinner last weekend, she stole one bite off each plate before anyone else could eat it—including Chandler Binge who was eating an entire roasted chicken by himself because nobody wanted any part of it." He continues to vent to his friends while gesturing wildly around the room using hand movements for emphasis <Cap>She even stoled my hat.</Img>. In this episode of Friends, titled "The One with the Safety Video," Ross and Rachel are on a plane headed towards Scranton when they realize that their safety video is not working. They try to fix it but end up getting into an argument about who should be blamed for bringing outdated technology onto the flight.
Meanwhile, Joey tries to impress his date by pretending he's from England while Chandler struggles through reading aloud a children's book during takeoff due to turbulence caused by another airplane passing nearby in mid-air collision course dangerously close proximity (the latter being partaken as if there was no tomorrow). Monica finds herself feeling jealous after seeing Janice talking intimately closely next door neighbor Richard; she then confides her feelings toward him only moments later discovering what looks like evidence suggesting otherwise – could these two possibly reconcile? Finally , Phoebe shares some disturbingly dark insights regarding how sometimes people just disappear without any explanation at all before revealing shock revelation number three: “Marcel” might actually exist!

caption__00015:
Certainly! In Season 2, Episode 1 of Friends titled "The One Where Monica Gets a Roommate," Rachel Green (Jennifer Aniston) returns to Central Perk after being away for several months. She is greeted by her friends Ross Geller (David Schwimmer), Joey Tribbiani (Matt LeBlanc), Chandler Bing ( Matthew Perry), and Phoebe Buffay(Lisa Kudrow).
Monica Gellar's (Courteney Cox) new roommate arrives at the coffee shop as well; it turns out that she has been using someone else credit card which leads into an awkward conversation between them . Meanwhile ,Ross tries unsuccessfully flirt with Rachel while he waits in line behind another woman who looks like his ex-wife Carol Willick from whom they are still on good terms despite their divorce.. As usual there’ s plenty more hilarity ensues when these six pals get together – including jokes about food allergies & misunderstandings involving phones calls made during bathroom breaks !

Certainly! In Season 2, Episode 1 of Friends titled "The One with the New Lease," Ross Geller (David Schwimmer) is struggling to find a new place for him and his pet monkey Marcel.
Ross enters into an agreement where he will pay $50 per month rent in exchange for using Chandler Bing's office space as living quarters because Monica has moved out after their breakup; however, things take turn when Rachel Green(Jennifer Aniston), who was evicted from her previous residence by Gunther due to having no money or food left there decides she wants that particular flat despite knowing it belongs to someone else since its affordable compared to other options available at such short notice before moving back home again like Joey Tribbiani did earlier during season one until they got kicked off once more later on down line which led them all here today -
